
=head1 NAME

chapter

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 title (character varying(256)) - 
 report_id (integer) - 
 number (integer) - 
 short_name (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                                    Table "gcis_metadata.chapter"
    Column   |          Type          |                      Modifiers                       | Storage  | Stats target | Description 
 ------------+------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+----------+--------------+-------------
  id         | integer                | not null default nextval('chapter_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    |              | 
  title      | character varying(256) |                                                      | extended |              | 
  report_id  | integer                |                                                      | plain    |              | 
  number     | integer                |                                                      | plain    |              | 
  short_name | character varying      | not null                                             | extended |              | 
 Indexes:
     "chapter_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
     "chapter_short_name_key" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (short_name)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "chapter_report_id_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES report(id)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "figure" CONSTRAINT "figure_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (chapter_id) REFERENCES chapter(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
